'''2.21.26''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on April 1, 2024.</onlyinclude>

== Changes ==
* [[Java Edition 24w14potato|April Fool's]] content added.
* Updates to Java version support help messaging.

== Fixes ==
* Various UI improvements and bug fixes
* {{bug|MCL-24096}} - When using Quick Launch feature of MCL, the world registers me like a new user
